[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Sardinian]: 800 mìglios de s’oleodotu Trans-Alaska sunt istados serrados a pustis de sa pèrdida de mìgias de bariles de petròlio grezu a sud de Fairbanks, Alaska.

[Sardinian]: Sas partes chi oe sunt de su Bèlgiu in antis faghiant parte de su Lussemburgu ma sunt coladas a su Bèlgiu a pustis de sa Rivolutzione belga de su 1830.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Sardinian]: Dae su cumintzu, The Onion est istada a beru un’imperu de sa parodia de sas noas, cun un’editzione imprentada, unu situ cun 5000000 bisitadores solos in su mese de Ledàmine, annùntzios personales, unu canale 24 oras de noas, podcast, e un’atlante de su mundu publicadu dae pagu, numenadu Our Dumb World.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

src_text: Sos chircadores de s’Universidade de Princeton in sos Istados Unidos e s’Universidade de Uppsala in Isvètzia ant riferidu chi sa genia noa s’est evòlvida in duas generatziones ebbia, mancari si creiat chi custu protzessu diat èssere duradu meda de prus, pro more de sa seletzione intre un’alibintu Darwin endèmicu, Geospiza fortes, e s’alibintu de su cactus, migradore, Geospiza conirostris.

ref_text: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Sardinian]: In sos sèculos, sa gente at fraigadu cun atentzione terratzas in su territòriu àsperu e ràbisu pròpiu subra de sas rocas chi s’afatzant a su mare.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Sardinian]: 800 mìglios de s’oleodotu Trans-Alaska sunt istados serrados a pustis de sa pèrdida de mìgias de bariles de petròlio grezu a sud de Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Sardinian]: Sas partes chi oe sunt de su Bèlgiu in antis faghiant parte de su Lussemburgu ma sunt coladas a su Bèlgiu a pustis de sa Rivolutzione belga de su 1830.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Sardinian]: Dae su cumintzu, The Onion est istada a beru un’imperu de sa parodia de sas noas, cun un’editzione imprentada, unu situ cun 5000000 bisitadores solos in su mese de Ledàmine, annùntzios personales, unu canale 24 oras de noas, podcast, e un’atlante de su mundu publicadu dae pagu, numenadu Our Dumb World.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
